# desktop_clipboard

A flutter plugin which could write images to clipboard.

|         |   |
|---------|---|
| Windows | ❌ |
| Linux   | ❌ |
| macOS   | ✅ |
| iOS     | ❌ |
| Web     | ❌ |

[![Desktop Clipboard](http://img.youtube.com/vi/PDhF-ZJaJDU/0.jpg)](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PDhF-ZJaJDU "Video Title")

## Getting Started

1. add `package:pasteboard` to `pubspec.yaml`

   ```yaml
   dependencies:
     desktop_clipboard: ^latest
   ```

2. example

   ```dart
   import 'package:file_picker/file_picker.dart';
   import 'package:desktop_clipboard/desktop_clipboard.dart';
   
   final _desktopClipboardPlugin = DesktopClipboard();

   Future<void> copyImageByPathToClipboard() async {
     final path = 'your_file_path';
     await _desktopClipboardPlugin
            .copyImageByPath(path);
   }

   Future<void> copyImageToClipboard() async {
    String base64Image =
        "";
    Uint8List bytes = base64.decode(base64Image);
    await _desktopClipboardPlugin.copyImage(bytes);
   }
   ```
